function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on digital channels in the built environment","Impact":"Reduced need for traditional physical spaces may lead to less ventilation and increased exposure to contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement technology to monitor and control indoor air quality and ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, air quality sensors, and ventilation monitoring tools.","People":"General public, occupants of built environments.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and technology manufacturers"},{"Description":"Population density in cities","Impact":"Higher risk of infection due to close proximity and interaction between individuals in densely populated areas.","Mitigation":"Urban planning for more open public spaces, decentralization of amenities, and improved public transportation.","Technologies":"Urban simulation modeling, urban design software, pedestrian flow analysis tools.","People":"Residents of densely populated cities.","Owner":"City governments, urban planners, and architects"},{"Description":"Household size and family structure","Impact":"Larger households and extended families have a higher likelihood of spreading the virus within the household.","Mitigation":"Promote targeted public health campaigns for household hygiene and provide support for effective quarantine measures within households.","Technologies":"Digital health communication platforms, household hygiene monitoring tools, and telehealth services.","People":"Members of large or extended families.","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations, and local governments"}]}
